metadata.Title: CVE-2022-30524 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: There is an invalid memory access in the TextLine class in TextOutputDev.cc in Xpdf 4.0.4 because the text extractor mishandles characters at large y coordinates. It can be triggered by (for example) sending a crafted pdf file to the pdftotext binary, which allows a remote attacker to cause a Denial of Service (Segmentation fault) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> no indication that this affects poppler ebarretto> xpdf in Debian uses poppler, which is not affected or fixed

criterions.comment: ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
